ComicInfo.Title: Alien Life Form
ComicInfo.Summary: What if the situation had been reversed? What with Willie had landed on ALF's planet and not vice versa? ALF shows that possibility to Willie in "Travels with Willie." Then it's the anniversary of ALF landing on Earth but the special cake the Tanners made for the event causes problems for their neighbor in "One Tiny Mistake."
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:36:21. [CVDB56902]
ComicInfo.Characters: ALF, Augie Shumway, Bob Shumway, Brian Tanner, Curtis Shumway, Dr. Strangeglove, Flo Shumway, Kate Tanner, Lucky, Lynn Tanner, Neep, Pete Zaparlor, Trevor Ochmonek, Willie Tanner, Ybor
